comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of April 9, 1916 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB0C17FC3F5D1773... reports that "The Turks are renewing their oppression in Armenia, according to the news received yesterday by the American Committee for Armenia and Syrian Relief." Headline is: TURKS RENEWING ARMENIAN EVICTIONS; Relief Committee Gets Word That More Funds Are Needed at Once. SEND TALES OF OUTRAGES All Men of Many Families Slain and Women and Girls Carried Away -- Thousands Face Starvation.
